### getIndexedEntry() {#a14f3b99ea7acdfe6ed22bf3fbc0ef16c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DwarfStringPool::EntryRef DwarfStringPool::getIndexedEntry (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter">AsmPrinter</a> &amp; Asm, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Str)</>}>
Same as getEntry, except that you can use <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfstringpoolentryref/#a357ae759731d2b8d69f8613004f8c8b2">EntryRef::getIndex</a> to obtain a unique <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> of this entry (e.g., for use in indexed forms like DW&#95;FORM&#95;strx).
